mapper.sql: confirmt_id, propert_id, confirm_no, transferee_, company_name, tel, transferee_date, obligor_seal, obligor_sign, obligor_date
mapper.select: SELECT brp.report_propert,br.`data1` AS 'debtName',brp.`data1` AS 'personName',brp.`data2` AS 'personCard',brp.`data3` AS 'priPhone',brp.`data5` AS 'corBankPhone',baa.assignment_agreement_no,pd.`create_time`,pd.service_principal,pd.service_interest FROM bus_report br LEFT JOIN bus_relative_person brp ON br.`report_id` = brp.`report_id` LEFT JOIN bus_propert bp ON br.`report_id` = bp.report_id LEFT JOIN bus_assignment_agreement baa ON bp.propert_id = baa.propert_id LEFT JOIN pub_debt pd ON br.`report_id` = pd.`report_id` WHERE brp.`relative_per_id` = #{relativePerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into bus_confirm (confirmt_id, propert_id, confirm_no, transferee_, company_name, tel, transferee_date, obligor_seal, obligor_sign, obligor_date) values (#{confirmtId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{propertId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{confirmNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transferee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transfereeDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{obligorSeal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obligorSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obligorDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into bus_confirm
confirmt_id,
propert_id,
confirm_no,
transferee_,
company_name,
tel,
transferee_date,
obligor_seal,
obligor_sign,
obligor_date,

mapper.update:
update bus_confirm
propert_id = #{propertId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
confirm_no = #{confirmNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transferee_ = #{transferee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transferee_date = #{transfereeDate,jdbcType=DATE},
obligor_seal = #{obligorSeal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
obligor_sign = #{obligorSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
obligor_date = #{obligorDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where confirmt_id = #{confirmtId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update bus_confirm set propert_id = #{propertId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, confirm_no = #{confirmNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transferee_ = #{transferee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transferee_date = #{transfereeDate,jdbcType=DATE}, obligor_seal = #{obligorSeal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, obligor_sign = #{obligorSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, obligor_date = #{obligorDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where confirmt_id = #{confirmtId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
